Name: VR Rescue Girls
About the game: This game is for VR only. Please make sure to check the operation with the demo version before purchasing. Sex simulation game . Find and rescue girls who have been turned into figurines! Have sex with the girls you find! The play scene is a simple sex simulation! Get the girl naked and change positions at will! You can even change the speed at which she shakes her hips! There are three girls in total, and you can have them all out at once for harem play! More girls to be added!
